name: Diona
desc: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredible popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

battle_talent.normal_desc1: Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
battle_talent.normal_desc2: Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo Damage.
battle_talent.normal_desc3: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG on impact.
battle_talent.element_desc:
Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target.Press: Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws.
Hold: Dashes back quickly before firing 5 Icy Paws. The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus.
The shield has a 250% Cryo DMG Absorption Bonus, and will infuse Diona with Cryo at the point of formation for a short duration.
battle_talent.final_desc:
Tosses out a special cold brew that deals AoE Cryo DMG and creates a Drunken Mist in an AoE.
Every 2 seconds, for 12 seconds, Drunken Mist:
Deals Cryo DMG to opponents within the field.
Regenerates the HP of characters within the field.

basic_talent.talent1_desc: Characters shielded by Icy Paws have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.
basic_talent.talent2_desc: Opponents who enter the AoE of Signature Mix have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.
basic_talent.talent3_desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, Diona has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

sof.sof1_desc: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.
sof.sof2_desc:
Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.
Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.
sof.sof3_desc:
Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof4_desc: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%
sof.sof5_desc:
Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof6_desc:
Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.
